meanings.definition: The act or process of diminishing or reducing in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The diminution of the cake's size was noticeable after everyone had a slice.
meanings.sent2: The company experienced a diminution in profits due to the economic downturn.
meanings.sent3: The diminution of the mountain of laundry made the room look tidier.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the diminution of light created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The artist used the technique of diminution to create a sense of distance in the painting.

meanings.definition: A decrease or reduction in amount or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The diminution of noise in the library made it easier to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: There was a diminution in the number of students attending the lecture.
meanings.sent3: The diminution of sugar in the recipe resulted in a less sweet dessert.
meanings.sent4: The diminution of tension in the room was palpable after the argument was resolved.
meanings.sent5: The gradual diminution of colors in the sky signaled the approaching night.
